narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Support Solutions of the Mid-south is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Memphis, TN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $45.1M in Medicaid payments across 142K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $45.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
